verses.text: At the same time , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, will I be the God of all the families of Israel , and they shall be my people.
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The people \add which were\add* left of the sword found grace in the wilderness ; \add even\add* Israel , when I went to cause him to rest.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath appeared of old unto me, \add saying\add*, Yea, I have loved thee with an everlasting love : therefore with lovingkindness have I drawn thee.\f + \fr 31.3 \ft of…: Heb. from afar\f*\f + \fr 31.3 \ft with lovingkindness…: have I extended lovingkindness unto thee\f*

Again I will build thee, and thou shalt be built , O virgin of Israel : thou shalt again be adorned with thy tabrets , and shalt go forth in the dances of them that make merry.\f + \fr 31.4 \ft tabrets: or, timbrels\f*
Thou shalt yet plant vines upon the mountains of Samaria : the planters shall plant , and shall eat \add them\add* as common things.\f + \fr 31.5 \ft eat…: Heb. profane them\f*
For there shall be a day , \add that\add* the watchmen upon the mount Ephraim shall cry , Arise ye, and let us go up to Zion unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our God.

For thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Sing with gladness for Jacob , and shout among the chief of the nations : publish ye, praise ye, and say , O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, save thy people , the remnant of Israel.

Behold, I will bring them from the north country , and gather them from the coasts of the earth , \add and\add* with them the blind and the lame , the woman with child and her that travaileth with child together : a great company shall return thither.

They shall come with weeping , and with supplications will I lead them: I will cause them to walk by the rivers of waters in a straight way , wherein they shall not stumble : for I am a father to Israel , and Ephraim \add is\add* my firstborn.\f + \fr 31.9 \ft supplications: or, favours\f* \p

¶ Hear the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O ye nations , and declare \add it\add* in the isles afar off , and say , He that scattered Israel will gather him, and keep him, as a shepherd \add doth\add* his flock.
For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath redeemed Jacob , and ransomed him from the hand of \add him that was\add* stronger than he.

Therefore they shall come and sing in the height of Zion , and shall flow together to the goodness of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for wheat , and for wine , and for oil , and for the young of the flock and of the herd : and their soul shall be as a watered garden ; and they shall not sorrow any more at all.
Then shall the virgin rejoice in the dance , both young men and old together : for I will turn their mourning into joy , and will comfort them, and make them rejoice from their sorrow.
And I will satiate the soul of the priests with fatness , and my people shall be satisfied with my goodness , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p

¶ Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; A voice was heard in Ramah , lamentation , \add and\add* bitter weeping ; Rahel weeping for her children refused to be comforted for her children , because they \add were\add* not.

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Refrain thy voice from weeping , and thine eyes from tears : for thy work shall be rewarded , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and they shall come again from the land of the enemy.
And there is hope in thine end , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that thy children shall come again to their own border. \p

¶ I have surely heard Ephraim bemoaning himself \add thus;\add* Thou hast chastised me, and I was chastised , as a bullock unaccustomed \add to the yoke:\add* turn thou me, and I shall be turned ; for thou \add art\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my God.
Surely after that I was turned , I repented ; and after that I was instructed , I smote upon \add my\add* thigh : I was ashamed , yea, even confounded , because I did bear the reproach of my youth.

\add Is\add* Ephraim my dear son ? \add is he\add* a pleasant child ? for since I spake against him, I do earnestly remember him still: therefore my bowels are troubled for him; I will surely have mercy upon him, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 31.20 \ft are…: Heb. sound\f*

Set thee up waymarks , make thee high heaps : set thine heart toward the highway , \add even\add* the way \add which\add* thou wentest : turn again , O virgin of Israel , turn again to these thy cities. \p
¶ How long wilt thou go about , O thou backsliding daughter ? for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath created a new thing in the earth , A woman shall compass a man.

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts , the God of Israel ; As yet they shall use this speech in the land of Judah and in the cities thereof, when I shall bring again their captivity ; The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* bless thee, O habitation of justice , \add and\add* mountain of holiness.
And there shall dwell in Judah itself, and in all the cities thereof together , husbandmen , and they \add that\add* go forth with flocks.
For I have satiated the weary soul , and I have replenished every sorrowful soul.
Upon this I awaked , and beheld ; and my sleep was sweet unto me. \p
¶ Behold, the days come , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will sow the house of Israel and the house of Judah with the seed of man , and with the seed of beast.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* like as I have watched over them, to pluck up , and to break down , and to throw down , and to destroy , and to afflict ; so will I watch over them, to build , and to plant , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
In those days they shall say no more, The fathers have eaten a sour grape , and the children’s teeth are set on edge.
But every one shall die for his own iniquity : every man that eateth the sour grape , his teeth shall be set on edge. \p
¶ Behold, the days come , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel , and with the house of Judah :

Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day \add that\add* I took them by the hand to bring them out of the land of Egypt ; which my covenant they brake , although I was an husband unto them, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:\f + \fr 31.32 \ft although…: or, should I have continued an husband unto them?\f*

But this \add shall be\add* the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel ; After those days , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will put my law in their inward parts , and write it in their hearts ; and will be their God , and they shall be my people.

And they shall teach no more every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for they shall all know me, from the least of them unto the greatest of them, saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for I will forgive their iniquity , and I will remember their sin no more. \p

¶ Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which giveth the sun for a light by day , \add and\add* the ordinances of the moon and of the stars for a light by night , which divideth the sea when the waves thereof roar ; The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts \add is\add* his name :
If those ordinances depart from before me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add then\add* the seed of Israel also shall cease from being a nation before me for ever.

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; If heaven above can be measured , and the foundations of the earth searched out beneath , I will also cast off all the seed of Israel for all that they have done , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. \p

¶ Behold, the days come , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that the city shall be built to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* from the tower of Hananeel unto the gate of the corner.
And the measuring line shall yet go forth over against it upon the hill Gareb , and shall compass about to Goath.

And the whole valley of the dead bodies , and of the ashes , and all the fields unto the brook of Kidron , unto the corner of the horse gate toward the east , \add shall be\add* holy unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; it shall not be plucked up , nor thrown down any more for ever.
